## Converters.jsonArray variable

A simple validating [JSON converter](./ts-json.jsonconverter.md)<!-- -->. Converts `unknown` to a , or fails if the unknown contains invalid JSON or is not an array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
jsonArray: Converter<JsonArray, IJsonContext>
```
